Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Display
    Handles displaying information on the EV3's lcd panel
    Driver
    Driver class, handles moving the robot.
    FinalProject
    Main class, contains the constants, motors, sensors and the main() method.
    LightLocalizer
    Performs the light localization
    LightPoller
    Polls the light sensor and sends the data to the SensorData class.
    Localizer
    Handles the localization of the robot, manages both the ultrasonic and light localizers.
    MainController
    Main controller This class is the main thread of the program and the root of the state machine that will control every action.
    Navigator
    Handles navigating through sets of waypoints as well as avoiding obstacles when they are encountered.
    Odometer  
    Searcher
    Uses the ultrasonic and light sensors mounted to the front of the robot to search for the 'flag'.
    SensorData
    Handles processing the sensor data and facilitates access to it.
    UltrasonicLocalizer
    Performs the ultrasonic localization
    UltrasonicPoller
    Polls the ultrasonic sensor and sends the data to the SensorData class.
    Waypoint
    Simple abstraction to represent grid points.
    ZipLine
    Handles crossing the zip line
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Driver.D_State
    Enum describing the current state of the driver
    Localizer.Loc_State
    Enum representing the state of the localizer.
    MainController.State
    Enum describing the state of the controller.
    Navigator.Nav_State
    Enum describing the state of the navigator.
    Searcher.S_State
    Enum describing the current state of the searcher.
    UltrasonicLocalizer.Mode  
    ZipLine.Zip_State
    Enum describing the current state of the zip line controller
